go_data.justification: SNRPB is involved in mRNA splicing as it is part of the Sm ring complex that binds small nuclear RNA.
SNRPB is part of the Sm ring complex that binds small nuclear RNA, which is typically found in the nucleus.
SNRPB binds to GIGYF1 through its LSM domain and a proline-rich repeat motif in its C-terminal region.
SNRPB is part of the Sm ring complex that binds small nuclear RNA.
